entropy.configuration.resources

Interface ResourceSpecification

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CPUConsSpecification, CPUCoresSpecification, CPUReservationSpecification, GetterBasedSpecification, MappedResourceSpecification, MemConsSpecification, MemReservationSpecification

    public interface ResourceSpecification
    specifies, for one resource known as its type the capacities of the nodes and the consumptions of the VMs for that resource.
    Author:
    Guillaume Le LouÃ«t [guillaume.lelouet@gmail.com] 2013

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      int getCapacity(Node n) 
      double getLoad(Configuration cfg)
      get the load, as vms consumption / nodes apacity, of the center relative to this resource

    • Method Detail

      • getType

        String getType()
        Returns:
        the type of the resources, used as an ID.

      • getUses

        int[] getUses(VirtualMachine[] vms)
        Parameters:
        vms - the vms to get the usages. Should not contain null values.
        Returns:
        the array of usages of this resource by the vms, such as ret[i]:=usage(vms[i])

      • getCapacities

        int[] getCapacities(Node... nodes)
        Parameters:
        nodes - the nodes to get the capacities. Should not contain null values.
        Returns:
        the array of capacities of this resource by the nodes, such as ret[i]:=capacity(nodes[i])

      • toUses

        Map<VirtualMachine,Integer> toUses()
        Returns:
        a map of the usages of the vms. Should return a value even if a vm is not present.

      • toCapacities

        Map<Node,Integer> toCapacities()
        Returns:
        a map of the capacities of the nodes. should return a value even if a node is not present.

      • getUse

        int getUse(VirtualMachine... vms)
        get the sum of the uses of vms
        Parameters:
        vms - the virtualMachines hosted on the given node
        Returns:
        the sum of the use of the vms

      • getCapacity

        int getCapacity(Node n)
        Parameters:
        n -
        Returns:

      • getLoad

        double getLoad(Configuration cfg)
        get the load, as vms consumption / nodes apacity, of the center relative to this resource
        Parameters:
        cfg - the center
        Returns:
        sum of vms consumptions / sum of nodes capacities
